template.name: Navigation Drawer Activity
template.description: Creates a new Activity with a Navigation Drawer.

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Title
parameter.help: The name of the activity. For launcher activities, the application title.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Fragment Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity's content fragment

parameter.name: App Bar Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the App Bar layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Navigation Header Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the Navigation header layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Drawer Menu Name
parameter.help: The name of the Drawer menu to create for the activity

parameter.name: Content Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the content layout to create for the activity
